properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 10:11PM EST until February 8 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 7 to 12 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
